attributes.action: Remove the eu flag from all government offices and stationary
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned want the eu flag, and any other reference to the eu, which does not signify any nation, but does indicate a corruption riddled democratically deficient body, from all UK Governmental buildings, all governmental stationary, and any other government related item such as passports, and the soon to be enforced identityt cards.
